name: Miao and the Friendmily Journal - Haw
name_original: Miao and the Friendmily Journal - Haw
description:
You want to play Miao game while reading Once Upon a Miao? The brand new adventure Miao game is here. A game came from my idea of my favorite fan comic Miao & WafuPafu and Once Upon a Miao.  Play one of the favorite Miao character and experience numerous story pages that might have some connection with Once Upon a Miao. 

Playable Characters (C) Miao WafuPafu

Haw (Miao's football schoolmate) 

Role as Crazy Solider Monkey (HP: 30)

- Adept at packed explosive weapons

- Collect more explosive weapons as items and bring some explosive action. 

- Speed up his mobility by using equipment like 100 Booster or rocket jump.

Journal Level Pages

- Page 1: Birdemic

Skin Cosmetics

i. Soccer

Dream Talents (Upgrade and Trade Off equip for Haw) 

A. I Wanna Be The Perfect

B. Coconut Football

C. It’s Party Time!!

D. Colonel Backpacker

E. Hyper Maniac

                                                                  ---TO BE CONTINUED---
